summary: Comprehensive monthly event log aligned to Wikipedia 2025 coverage; includes politics, conflicts, climate, tech, sports, and culture milestones.

events.event: 2025 Polish presidential election : Karol Nawrocki is narrowly elected
events.details: 2025 Polish presidential election : Karol Nawrocki is narrowly elected President of Poland in the second round of voting, beating Rafał Trzaskowski

events.event: More than 40 aircraft of the Russian Air Force are
events.details: More than 40 aircraft of the Russian Air Force are attacked

events.event: Operation Spiderweb : Ukraine launches a large drone attack on
events.details: Operation Spiderweb : Ukraine launches a large drone attack on Russian military bases

events.event: 2025 Mongolian protests : Luvsannamsrain Oyun-Erdene resigns as Prime Minister
events.details: 2025 Mongolian protests : Luvsannamsrain Oyun-Erdene resigns as Prime Minister of Mongolia after losing a no confidence vote in the State Great Khural

events.event: 2025 South Korean presidential election : After being pushed forward
events.details: 2025 South Korean presidential election : After being pushed forward as a result of the impeachment of Yoon Suk Yeol , Lee Jae Myung wins the election, beating Kim Moon-soo

events.event: June 2025 Los Angeles protests : Protests erupt in Los
events.details: June 2025 Los Angeles protests : Protests erupt in Los Angeles in response to Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) arrests and deportations of illegal immigrants

events.event: 10 people are killed and another >30 injured after a
events.details: 10 people are killed and another >30 injured after a gunman opens fire at a school in Graz , Austria

events.event: Air India Flight 171 , a London-bound Boeing 787 ,
events.details: Air India Flight 171 , a London-bound Boeing 787 , crashes into a building after take-off from Ahmedabad , India, killing 229 passengers, 12 crew on board, and 19 people on the ground

events.event: It is the first fatal crash and hull loss involving
events.details: It is the first fatal crash and hull loss involving a Boeing 787 Dreamliner

events.event: One passenger survives the crash
events.details: One passenger survives the crash

events.event: Iran–Israel war : Israel conducts air strikes against Iran's nuclear
events.details: Iran–Israel war : Israel conducts air strikes against Iran's nuclear facilities, killing military commanders including Hossein Salami ; Iran retaliates

events.event: , as well as Canada, Europe, Japan and Mexico, against
events.details: , as well as Canada, Europe, Japan and Mexico, against Donald Trump

events.event: July 13 – The 2025 FIFA Club World Cup is
events.details: July 13 – The 2025 FIFA Club World Cup is held in the United States , and is won by Chelsea

events.details: The No Kings protests occur across many cities in the U

events.event: 17 – The 51st G7 summit is held in Kananaskis,
events.details: 17 – The 51st G7 summit is held in Kananaskis, Canada

events.event: An EF5 tornado strikes southeast of Enderlin, North Dakota ,
events.details: An EF5 tornado strikes southeast of Enderlin, North Dakota , becoming the first EF5 tornado globally since May 20, 2013

events.event: Iran–Israel war : The United States carries out B-2 bomber
events.details: Iran–Israel war : The United States carries out B-2 bomber airstrikes on three Iranian nuclear sites in Fordow , Natanz , and Isfahan

events.event: Iran launches missiles at US bases in Qatar and Iraq
events.details: Iran launches missiles at US bases in Qatar and Iraq in response to the previous day's strikes

events.event: 25 – A NATO summit is held at the World
events.details: 25 – A NATO summit is held at the World Forum in The Hague, Netherlands

events.event: The Axiom Mission 4 is launched
events.details: The Axiom Mission 4 is launched

events.event: The mission involves four astronauts, including the first astronauts from
events.details: The mission involves four astronauts, including the first astronauts from Poland ( Sławosz Uznański-Wiśniewski ) and India ( Shubhanshu Shukla ) since the end of the Cold War

events.event: , with Qatari support, brokers a preliminary peace treaty between
events.details: , with Qatari support, brokers a preliminary peace treaty between the Democratic Republic of the Congo and Rwanda , ending their armed conflict that started in 2022
